items.sentence: Looking closer at the photos, I could tell that the weasel was an American marten by the light color of the fur on its throat.
Ray was willing to corroborate Gary's story, but the police were still unconvinced that either of them were telling the truth.
I couldn't believe myself when she pretended to be angry. Her loud voice, red face...the whole caboodle was pretty convincing.
Someone had definitely spiked Tom's drink, because he could no longer stand up and the next morning he could remember nothing.
I never meant to say that the conservatives are generally stupid. I meant to say that stupid people are generally conservative.
